CommonNomenclature.description:
Common list of values for specific information attributes required for the reporting of annual information in accordance with decision 2/CMA.3, annex, chapter IV (Reporting).
Pursuant to decision 6/CMA.4, Annex I, paragraph 28.
Attributes are listed in decision 6/CMA.4, paragraph 17(j), Annex I, paragraph 5.
This nomenclature also includes attributes that are not in the AEF, but are required by tracking registries established under Article 6.

AEF fields: Actions: First transferring participating Party ID
Holdings: First transferring participating Party ID
ParticipatingParty.description:
Standard codes for identifying participating parties under Article 6.2 of the Paris Agreement.
ISO-3166-1 alpha-3 code of the Party's country.
Exceptionally reserved code elements, such as EUE for the European Union, are also allowed.

SubmissionVersion.description:
The version number of the AEF Report for that year.
The format of the version number must by "X.Y" 
where X is a non-zero integer representing the major version,
and Y is an integer representing the minor version.
The first version is always "1.0"

ReportedYear.description: The four-digit year during which the actions occurred.

DateOfSubmission.description:
The date of the AEF submission.
The format is "dd/mm/yyyy".

FirstYearOfNDCPeriod.attribute: First year of the NDC implementation period
AEF fields: Submission: First year of the NDC implementation period
FirstYearOfNDCPeriod.description: The four-digit year that is the first year of the Party's NDC implementation period.

LastYearOfNDCPeriod.attribute: Last year of the NDC implementation period
AEF fields: Submission: Last year of the NDC implementation period
LastYearOfNDCPeriod.description: The four-digit year that is the last year of the Party's NDC implementation period.

AuthorizationID.description:
The Authorization ID as assigned by the reporting Party.
Authorization IDs can only contain alphanumeric, space, and hyphen characters.

AEF fields: Authorized entities: Date of the authorization
DateOfAuthorization.description: The date on which the authorization was issued.  The format is "dd/mm/yyyy".

CooperativeApproachID.description:
A unique identifier of one of the cooperative approaches under Article 6.2.
The format of the string is "CANNNN" where the "CA" is the fixed prefix, and NNNN is a four-digit integer, that shall be incremented by one for each additional agreed cooperative approach, and added to this common nomenclature.

definedValues.description: Article 6.4 mechanism (between Parties to the Paris Agreement)
Promotion of climate smart agriculture practices for sustainable rice cultivation in Ghana (between Ghana and Switzerland)

AuthorizationVersion.description: The version number of the authorization.  This is an integer.

AuthorizedQuantity.description: This field is optional. It may be used to specify the maximum quantity of mitigation outcomes that are authorized for use towards an NDC and/or OIMP.

Metric.description:
The metric used to measure the ITMO.
Must be either "GHG" or "non-GHG".

definedValues.description: ITMO is measured in tonnes Carbon Dioxide equivalent
ITMO is not measured in tonnes Carbon Dioxide equivalent

GWPValues.description: If the mitigation outcome involves a non-CO2 greenhouse gas(es), the global warming potential (GWP) value(s) applied, consistent with the relevant CMA decisions (e.g.,'100-year values from 5th assessment report by the IPCC').

Non-GHGMetric.description: Type of non-GHG metric applied (e.g., ‘megawatt hours of renewable electricity generation’). This field should be reported as ‘Not applicable’ (NA), or left blank, if the ITMOs are in a GHG metric.

Sectors.description: One or more sectors where the mitigation outcome occurred based on IPCC guidelines.

definedValues.description: Methane reduction nitrous oxide emission reduction are some examples of initiatives aimed at the agriculture sector, sustainable fish production, etc.
Zero-energy and passive houses, green roofs and walls for urban buildings, smart grids and building automation systems, sustainable urban drainage systems, climateadaptive urban planning.
ITMOs that cannot be associated to a specific sector since they are the net flow of mitigation outcomes coming from a different mechanism.
Wind farms, offshore wind power, solar farms, hydroelectric plants, geothermal heating and cooling solutions or biomass energy, etc.
Mangrove restoration, seagrass plantation, urban forestry and green spaces development, peatland restoration and conservation, soil carbon enhancement, land-use planning for reduced urban sprawl.
Fuel switching, carbon capture and storage (CCS), green chemistry, waste gas and heat recovery.

Hydrogen fuel cell vehicles and refueling infrastructure, sustainable biofuels for aviation and shipping, electric public transit systems, active transport infrastructure (bike lanes, pedestrian zones), smart logistics and freight transport efficiency.
Vegetative cover, afforestation, permeable surfaces, green roofs, rain gardens, bioretention swales, natural and constructed wetlands, converting abandoned industrial sites into urban parks.

Methane capture from landfills, waste-to-energy projects, Advanced recycling technologies, Biogas generation from organic waste, Circular economy models for industries (sharing, repairing, recycling), and the reduction of organic waste through composting and anaerobic digestion.
ITMOs that are authorized to be used towards NDC (nationally determined contribution) achievement.
ITMOs that are authorized to be used for cancelled for OIMP (other international mitigation purposes).
ITMOs that are authorized to be used for cancelled for IMP (international mitigation purposes).
ITMOs that are authorized to be used for cancelled for OP (other purposes).

ITMOs that are authorized to be used towards NDC (nationally determined contribution) achievement;
and be used or cancelled for OIMP (other international mitigation purposes).

ITMOs that are authorized to be used towards NDC (nationally determined contribution) achievement;
and be used or cancelled for IMP (international mitigation purposes).

ITMOs that are authorized to be used towards NDC (nationally determined contribution) achievement;
and be used or cancelled for OP (other purposes).

AuthorizedPartyIDs.description: Parties may authorize mitigation outcomes for use by any Party or for a specific Party(ies). Where a specific Party(ies) is specified, the unique identifier of that Party(ies) is entered here as per common nomenclatures.

AuthorizedEntityIDs.description: Unique identifier of the entities that are authorized within cooperative approach, if applicable.

AEF fields: Authorizations: OIMP authorized by the Party
OIMPAuthorized.description: This field is only applicable if the authorization is for OIMP. This field specifies the other international mitigation purpose (OIMP), which may be an international mitigation purpose (IMP) or other purpose (OP). The specific purpose (e.g., use under the Carbon Offsetting and Reduction Scheme for International Aviation) is entered in this field.

AuthorizedTimeframe.description:
This field is optional. It may be filled to specify the timeframe for which mitigation outcomes may occur (e.g., from 2021 - 2030) that are covered under the authorization and/or the time frame in which the mitigation outcomes may be used (e.g. from 2021 - 2030).
If specified it must in the format of 4-digit years, separated by a hyphen: "dddd - dddd".

AuthorizationT&Cs.description: This field is optional. It may be completed to specify the terms and conditions under which the authorization is provided.

AEF fields: Authorizations: First transfer definition for OIMP
FirstTransferDefnForOIMP.description: This field is only applicable to authorizations for use towards OIMP. This field specifies the first transfer definition used by the Party pursuant to decision 2/CMA.3, annex, para. 2(b). In other cases, this field is reported as ‘Not applicable’ (NA) or left blank.

definedValues.description: First transfer defined for ITMOs that are authorized for OIMP pursuant 2 (b)(1) Authorisation, Annex, 2/CMA.3.
First transfer defined for ITMOs that are authorized for OIMP pursuant 2 (b)(2) Issuance, Annex, 2/CMA.3.
First transfer defined for ITMOs that are authorized for OIMP pursuant 2 (b)(3) Use or Cancellation, Annex, 2/CMA.3.

AdditionalExplanatoryInformation.description: This field is optional. The Party may use this field to provide any additional information.

ActionDateTime.description:
ISO 8601 timestamp of the action:"<yyyy-mm-dd>T<hh:mm:ss.sss>Z".
The 'Z' denotes that all timestamps to be provided with zero UTC offset

ActionType.description: Actions to be reported by Partipating Parties, pursuant Decision 2/CMA.3, Annex, paragraph 20(a), paragraph 29.

definedValues.description: Used when reporting the authorization of an ITMO.
Used when reporting the international transfer of an ITMO.
Used when reporting the international transfer of an ITMO.
Used when reporting the international acquisition of an ITMO.
Used when reporting the use of an ITMO.
Used when reporting the cancellation of an ITMO.
Used when reporting the cancellation of an ITMO.

ActionSubtype.description: Actions subtypes depend on the Action type.

definedValues.description: Subtype of First transfer
Subtype of First transfer
Subtype of First transfer
Subtype of First transfer

definedValues.value: Mandatory transfer to the Adaptation Fund (A6.4 ERs)
definedValues.description: Subtype of Transfer.

definedValues.value: Voluntary transfer to the Adaptation Fund (A6.4 ERs)
definedValues.description: Subtype of Transfer.
Subtype of cancellation (or first transfer for cancellation).
Subtype of cancellation (or first transfer for cancellation).
Subtype of cancellation (or first transfer for cancellation).
Other not yet defined subtype.

AEF fields: Actions: First transferring participating Party ID
Holdings: First transferring participating Party ID
FirstTransferringPartyID.description: ISO-3166-1 alpha-3 code of the participating Party in which the authorized mitigation outcome occurred.

FirstID.description:
Identifier of the first ITMO in the block, commencing with First ID, ending with Last ID.
Blocks from the same Originating Party Registry cannot overlap.

LastID.description:
Identifier of the last ITMO in the block, commencing with First ID, ending with Last ID.
Blocks from the same Originating Party Registry cannot overlap.

UnderlyingUnitRegistryID.description:
Unique identifier of the underlying cooperative approach registry (or carbon crediting programme).
This field should be reported as ‘Not applicable’ (NA), or left blank, if the cooperative approach does not use an underlying cooperative approach registry.

definedValues.description: Verified Carbon Standard
Gold Standard
Climate Action Reserve
American Carbon Registry
Architecture for REDD+ Transactions
Global Carbon Council
Cercarbono
Isometric
Biocarbon Fund Initiative for Sustainable Forest Landscapes
Forest Carbon Parnership Facility
Thailand Voluntary Emission Reduction Programme
Joint Crediting Mechanism

UnderlyingUnitFirstUnitID.attribute: Underlying unit unique identifier first unit ID
UnderlyingUnitFirstUnitID.description:
Identifier of the first ITMO in the block, commencing with First unit ID, ending with Last unit ID.
Blocks from the same Underlying unit registry cannot overlap.

UnderlyingUnitLastUnitID.attribute: Underlying unit unique identifier last unit ID
UnderlyingUnitLastUnitID.description:
Identifier of the last ITMO in the block, commencing with First unit ID, ending with Last unit ID.
Blocks from the same Underlying unit registry cannot overlap.

QuantityCO2.description: Quantity of ITMOs in metric tons of CO2 equivalent.

QuantityNon-GHG.description: Quantity of ITMOs in the respective non-GHG metric. This field should be reported as ‘Not applicable’ (NA), or left blank, if the ITMOs are in a GHG metric.

MitigationType.description: Allowed values: "Emission reductions", "Removals", "Emission reductions and removals".

definedValues.description: Emission reductions only
Removals only
Both emission reductions and removals

Vintage.description: Year in which mitigation outcome occured.

TransferringPartyID.description:
ISO-3166-1 alpha-3 code of the transferring participating Party or, where the transfer occurs from the Adaptation Fund to a Party, a unique identifier for the Adaptation Fund.
This field is only applicable to the action type ‘acquisition’.
In other cases, this field is reported as ‘Not applicable’ (NA) or left blank.

AcquiringPartyID.description:
ISO-3166-1 alpha-3 code of the acquiring participating Party, or where the acquisition occurs by the Adaptation Fund, a unique identifier for the Adaptation Fund.
This field is applicable to the action types ‘first transfer’ and ‘transfer’.
In other cases, this field is reported as ‘Not applicable’ (NA) or left blank.

AEF fields: Actions: Purposes for which ITMO has been used towards or cancelled for OIMP
PurposeITMOUsedForOIMP.description:
This field specifies the purpose for which the ITMO has been first transferred for use towards international mitigation purposes (IMP), cancelled for other purposes (OP) or cancelled for purposes referred to in paragraph 20(a), annex, decision 2/CMA.3.
This field is only applicable to the action types ‘use’, ‘first transfer’ and ‘cancellation’. In other cases, this field is reported as Not applicable’ (NA) or left blank.

Using/cancellingPartyID.description:
ISO-3166-1 alpha-3 code of the using or cancelling participating Party.
This field is only applicable to report a use for IMP or cancellation for OP.
In other cases, this field is reported as ‘Not applicable’ (NA) or left blank.

Using/cancellingEntityID.description:
ISO-3166-1 alpha-3 code of using or cancelling authorized entity.
This field is only applicable to report the use or cancellation of authorized mitigation outcomes or ITMOs by authorized entities.
In other cases, this field is reported as ‘Not applicable’ (NA) or left blank.

AEF fields: Actions: Calendar year for which the ITMOs are used towards the Party's NDC
YearITMOUsedTowardsNDC.description:
The calendar year for which the ITMOs are used towards an NDC.
This field is only applicable for use of ITMOs towards the Party’s NDC.
In other cases, this field is reported as ‘Not applicable’ (NA) or left blank.

AuthorizedEntityCountryOfIncorporation.description: ISO-3166-1 alpha-3 code of the country in which the authorized entity is incorporated.

AuthorizedEntityID.description: Identification number of the authorized entity within its country of incorporation.

AuthorizedEntityConditions.description:
This field is optional.
The conditions under which the authorization was provided, as applicable.

AuthorizedEntityChangeConditions.attribute: Authorized entity change and revocation conditions
AEF fields: Authorized Entities: Change and revocation conditions.
AuthorizedEntityChangeConditions.description:
This field is optional.
Whether the authorization could be changed or revoked and under which conditions

FirstTransfer.description:
Definition of "first transfer" pursuant to decision, 2/CMA.3, Annex, paragraph 2.
Therefore defines the "First Transferring Party.".

definedValues.description: First transfer defined for ITMOs that are authorized for NDC pursuant 2 (a), Annex, 2/CMA.3.
First transfer defined for ITMOs that are authorized for OIMP pursuant 2 (b)(1) Authorisation, Annex, 2/CMA.3.
First transfer defined for ITMOs that are authorized for OIMP pursuant 2 (b)(2) Issuance, Annex, 2/CMA.3.
First transfer defined for ITMOs that are authorized for OIMP pursuant 2 (b)(3) Use or Cancellation, Annex, 2/CMA.3.

OriginatingPartyRegistry.description:
The registry identifier of the registry that prepared the ITMO for first transfer.
Registry identifiers consist of the ISO-3166-1 alpha-3 code of its participating Party, and a unique two digit registry identifier within the participating Party.

ActivityType.description: The mitigation activity type(s) from which the ITMOs were generated.

definedValues.description: Projects that involve the afforestation of land.
Projects aimed at reducing emissions from agricultural practices.
Projects that generate energy from biogas.
Projects that generate energy from biomass resources.
Projects in the cement industry aimed at reducing emissions.

Projects aimed at improving the efficiency of energy distribution.

Projects aimed at improving energy efficiency in the industrial sector.
Projects aimed at improving energy efficiency in own generation facilities.
Projects aimed at improving energy efficiency in the service sector.
Projects aimed at improving energy efficiency on the supply side.
Projects that switch from fossil fuels to cleaner energy sources.
Projects that capture fugitive emissions from industrial processes.
Projects that generate energy from geothermal sources.
Projects that generate electricity from hydroelectric sources.
Projects that capture and utilize landfill gas for energy production.
Projects that avoid methane emissions through various methods.
Projects that reduce emissions of nitrous oxide (N2O).
Projects that reduce emissions of perfluorocarbons (PFCs) and sulfur hexafluoride (SF6).
Projects that involve the reforestation of land.
Projects that generate electricity from solar power.
Projects that generate electricity from tidal energy.
Projects aimed at reducing emissions from transport.
Projects aimed at reducing waste and emissions from waste management.
Projects that generate electricity from wind power.

AccountType.description: Minimum Account Types supported by the mechanism registry, under Article 6.4, Decision 7.CMA.4, Annex I - paragraph 32

definedValues.description: Holding.
ITMO
